text: Your Acquaintance () is a 1927 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Lev Kuleshov.Платоновский фестиваль принесет современное искусство в старую типографиюСамодостаточная хроника It stars Aleksandra Khokhlova, Pyotr Galadzhev, and Yuri Vasilchikov. ==Actors== * Aleksandra Khokhlova as Khokhlova - journalist * Pyotr Galadzhev as Secretary * Yuri Vasilchikov as Vasilchikov * Boris Ferdinandov as Petrovski * Anna Chekulaeva as Petrovsky's wife == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1927 drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Kuleshov
title: Your Acquaintance
